arguments.name: days
arguments.description: number of days in time period

arguments.name: hours
arguments.description: number of hours in time period

arguments.name: minutes
arguments.description: number of minutes in time period

arguments.name: seconds
arguments.description: number of seconds in time period

arguments.name: milliseconds
arguments.description: number of milliseconds in time period

name: createtimespan
description:
Creates a date/time object that defines a time period. You
        can add or subtract it from other date/time objects and use
        it with the cachedWithin attribute of cfquery.
